channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Told In Glass
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (C. S. Montanye)
item.description: Old Man Johnson had finally succeeded in inventing something of value. And Blumfeld wanted the $10,0000 the old man had been paid. But would the old inventor's brain child really identify a killer?
